_comment: LD7 V1 WhatsApp Bot - Pterodactyl Egg Configuration
name: LD7 V1 WhatsApp Bot
author: mr-Colab
description: LD7 V1 is a powerful WhatsApp Multi-User Bot with dashboard for managing multiple bot instances. Deploy and connect multiple WhatsApp accounts through a single panel.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt install -y git ffmpeg

if [ -d "/mnt/server/.git" ]; then
    cd /mnt/server
    git pull
else
    git clone https://github.com/mr-Colab/simple-bot.git /mnt/server
fi

cd /mnt/server
npm install

variables.name: Port
variables.description: The port the bot dashboard will listen on

variables.name: Phone Number
variables.description: Your WhatsApp phone number with country code (e.g., 919876543210). Leave empty for multi-user mode.

variables.name: Database URL
variables.description: PostgreSQL database URL for session backup (e.g., postgresql://user:pass@host:5432/db)

variables.name: Endpoint URL
variables.description: Public URL for the bot dashboard (e.g., https://your-domain.com:8000). Used for keep-alive pings.

variables.name: Command Prefix
variables.description: Prefix for bot commands (e.g., . or ! or #)

variables.name: Sudo Numbers
variables.description: Owner/admin phone numbers with country code, separated by commas

variables.name: Work Type
variables.description: Bot mode: 'public' (everyone can use) or 'private' (only sudo users)

variables.name: Pterodactyl Mode
variables.description: Set to 'true' to enable Pterodactyl-specific features

variables.name: GitHub Token
variables.description: GitHub Personal Access Token for session backup (optional)

variables.name: GitHub Owner
variables.description: GitHub username for session backup repository

variables.name: GitHub Repo
variables.description: GitHub repository name for session backup
